Member Function Documentation

virtual void CStateMachine::clearStates (  )  [virtual]

Destroy all states and clear the states array. This method is called when the machine stop running

virtual void CStateMachine::initStates ( IrrlichtDevice *  pDevice  )  [virtual]

In this method all states of the machine have to be initialized. This is called by the state machine before it actually starts running
